metadata.title: CVE-2018-17199 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
In Apache HTTP Server 2.4 release 2.4.37 and prior, mod_session checks thesession expiry time before decoding the session. This causes session expirytime to be ignored for mod_session_cookie sessions since the expiry time isloaded when the session is decoded.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-17199` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

apache2 - 2.4.18-2ubuntu3.10
apache2-bin - 2.4.18-2ubuntu3.10
apache2-data - 2.4.18-2ubuntu3.10
apache2-suexec-custom - 2.4.18-2ubuntu3.10
apache2-suexec-pristine - 2.4.18-2ubuntu3.10
apache2-utils - 2.4.18-2ubuntu3.10
No subscription required

criterions.comment: apache2 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.4.18-2ubuntu3.10').
